description: Consider all integer triples (i,j,k), j >= k > 0, with binomial(i+2,3)=j^3+k^3, ordered by increasing i; sequence gives j values.
comments: The i values are in A054205 and k values in A054207.
mathematica: lst = {}; Do[ b = Binomial[i + 2, 3]; j = Floor[b^(1/3)]; lmt = Ceiling[j/2]; While[ k = (b - j^3)^(1/3); j > lmt && !IntegerQ[k], j-- ]; If[j != lmt, Print[{i, j, k}]; AppendTo[lst, {i, j, k}]], {i, 2, 30000}]; (Transpose@lst)[[2]] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Jan 15 2007 *)
author: Klaus Strassburger (strass(AT)ddfi.uni-duesseldorf.de), Jan 28 2000
extensions: Offset corrected by _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jan 14 2009
